info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 3:22PM PST until December 25 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM FRIDAY TO 10 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Central Siskiyou County including Yreka, Montague, Weed and Hilt. This also includes Interstate 5 in the Shasta Valley. * WHEN...From 1 PM Friday to 10 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. * Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. * See http://quickmap.dot.ca.gov for latest road conditions. * A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.
